description: Detects tampering with attachment manager settings policies attachments (See reference for more information)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Attachment Manager Settings Attachments Tamper
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\\.*/ AND (((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Hh][Ii][Dd][Ee][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Ii][Ee][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Aa][Vv][Ee][Zz][Oo][Nn][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000002\)/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Ww][Ii][Tt][Hh][Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/))))
